full_translation:
**Highest Celestial Jade Emperor's Supreme Wish and Precious Repentance Sutra**
*Ten volumes.* Source text: *Zhengtong Daozang* (正统道藏), *Tongzhen* (洞真) section, *Rituals and Etiquette* (威仪) category.

---

**Volume the First**
**Preface to the Teachings**
**Repentance Ritual**

Offering incense to the Daoist Emperor, hoping that my humble sincerity may reach the heavens;
Sending fragrant offerings to the gods, relying on the rising *qi* (氤氲) to ascend.

With reverence, I present the *Dao* incense, the *virtue/power* (德) incense, the *wisdom* (慧) incense, the *non-action* (無為) incense, the *purity and tranquility* (清靜) incense, the *natural* (自然) incense, the *wondrous primordial truth* (妙洞真) incense, the *transcendent Three Realms* (超三界) incense, and the *Three Realms of Truth* (三境真) incense. These fill the celestial palace of jade and golden lights, pervade the *Dharma Realm* (法界) of the entire cosmos, and universally extend offerings.

The preceptor of this Sutra is the **Primordial Sovereign of the Beginning of Dao** (元始天尊) who embraces and presents the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Lord of the Dao** (玉帝道君天尊), the **Sage of the Transmitted Holy Teachings, Born from the Dao** (流演聖教降生天尊), the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Great Sage of All Heavenly Manifestations** (諸天化身玉皇大天尊), and the **Highest Celestial Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玄穹高上帝). The **Emperor-Father of Radiant Majesty and Wondrous Joy** (帝父光嚴妙樂國王), the **Empress-Mother of Precious Moonlight, the Celestial Consort** (帝母寶月光皇后), and the **Awakened King of Purity and Naturalness, the Sage of Highest Emptiness and Clarity** (清靜自然覺王如來高虛清明天主帝君).

I respectfully invoke the **Highest Celestial Sovereign of Jade Emptiness** (玉虚上帝), the **Supreme Celestial Sovereign of the Boundless Heaven** (昊天上帝), the **Great Bodhisattvas of the Golden Immortals across the Three Ages** (三世金仙大乘菩薩), the **Boundless Saints of Ten Directions** (十方至聖無量帝君), the **Primordial Ancestors of Heaven and Earth** (天地始祖五老上帝), the **Four Great True Persons of Responsive Mercy, Compassionate Liberation, Deliverance of Life and Death, and Infinite Blessings for Protection** (寻聲救苦、慈悲度厄、濟生度死、萬福護身四大真人), the **Luminous Jade Maiden** (夜光玉女), and the **All Primordial Lords** (一切元君). All the **Celestial True Persons of the Pure and Natural** (天真皇人一切大仙), the **Aid-Sage, Lord of the Northern Pole, Mysterious Celestial Sovereign** (北極佑聖真君玄天上帝), the **Nine-Heaven Exalted Lawmasters of Teaching and Assisting the Primordial** (三天扶教輔元大法天師), the **Nine-Heaven Sovereign of Manifestation and Response, Lord of the Spirit’s Answer** (九天開化主宰靈應帝君), the **Sovereign of Pure and Correct Enlightenment, Lord of Benevolent Aid** (演正警化純陽孚佑帝君), the **True Person of Responsive Compassion and Wondrous Communication, Lord of Benevolent Rescue** (應感妙通慈濟朱真人), the **True Person of the Mysterious Dao and Benevolent Guidance, Jade Hare White Sage** (洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人), the **Great Sage of Universal Benevolence, Infinite Mercy, and Manifested Aid, Lord of Extensive Protection** (大慈永元普濟顯靈廣佑羅真君), and the **Ancestral Sages of all stages—Pure and Mysterious, Spirit Treasure, Dao Virtue, and Rectified Unity** (清微、靈寶、道德、正一諸階演法垂文授受諸大祖師真人仙眾), as well as the **Celestial Marshals of Thunderous Authority** (雷霆諸司天將), the **clerks and soldiers of the Daoist talismans** (法箓吏兵), the **Mystic Sage of the Boundless Flight, Lord of Wondrous Conduct** (飛天大聖無極神王妙行真人), the **Spiritual Consorts and Jade Maidens** (靈妃玉女), the **Great True Persons of Ten Directions, Three Realms, and All Heavenly and Earthly Waters** (十方三界、諸天地水諸大真人), and the **Infinite Sacred Assembly present in this gathering** (一時會中、無量聖眾).

All kneel with devout hearts, offering incense in accordance with the ritual.
The **Daoist official of talismans** (具箓職臣某) humbly records and presents this to the **disciple of the Great Dao** (奉大道弟子某等), with utmost sincerity and piety.

---

**My Humble Petition**
I, a disciple of the Dao residing in the [certain] prefecture, [certain] county, and [certain] locality (臣今奏為某府某縣某處居), with sincere devotion (奉道臣某 所伸凡悃), dare to offend the celestial authority (干冒天威), and with reverence, seek the Emperor’s boundless mercy (仰望洪慈), while humbly following the ritual of incense (俯從丹祷).

On this auspicious day of the fifth month (谷旦), I present my offerings with utmost sincerity (式展刍忱), arranging incense and flowers in devotion (香花羅列以歸依), setting forth lamps and fruits for universal sustenance (燈果廣陳而供養). I humbly pray for a temporary respite from the celestial court (恭望暫離帝闕), so that the Emperor may graciously descend to this mortal assembly (款駐凡筵).

Looking down upon my earnest sincerity (俯察精虔), the Emperor beholds the gratitude of the humble (鑒苹蘩之報謝).
Piercing my heartfelt pleas (洞矜懇切), the Emperor responds to the sincerity of the lowly (副草芥之微誠).

With reverence, I face the divine mercy (恭對天慈), proclaiming and extolling the method of repentance (宣揚忏法).

---

**The Celestial Decree**
The assembly responds: *"The Celestial Edict!"* (眾哗，玉詔曰)

**The Highest Supreme Lord of Boundless Dao,**
The realm of **Mysterious Possession** (妙有玄真境),
Vast and distant, the **Purple-Gold Celestial Gate** (渺渺紫金闕).
The **Pure and Mysterious Palace of the Highest Celestial** (太微玉清宮),
The **Boundless Supreme Sage** (無極無上聖).
Radiant and descending (廓落發光明),
Silent and boundless (寂寂浩無宗).
The **Primordial Pattern encompasses all Ten Directions** (玄範總十方),
The **Dao of Eternal Stillness and True Constancy** (湛寂真常道).
The **Great Sage of Boundless Transformation** (恢漠大神通),
The **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝).

**Each bows once.**
I, with resolute heart, submit in homage (臣等志心歸命禮),
Praying that the **Six Supernatural Powers** may be employed to radiate the **Great Light** (願舉六通力放大光明),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝).

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Ten-Directional Heavenly Palaces** may be graced with divine presence (願分身十方諸大天宮),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Palace of Great Light** may ascend to the **Seat of Radiance** (願大光明殿升光明座),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao of Purity and Liberation** may be expounded (願演說清靜解脫之道),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Great Mystic Sound** may proclaim to all Ten Directions (願出大妙音普告十方),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Divine Transformation** may remain undisturbed, bridging heaven and man (願神通不動移接天人),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may rescue all beings, granting them peace and joy (願拯救眾生令得安樂),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may widely employ expedient means to aid the state and save the people (願廣行方便助國救人),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Daoist Canon** may be opened to expound the **Sacred Scriptures** (願啟諸道藏演說靈章),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Rectified Transformation** may be proclaimed and the divine virtues extolled (願恢宣正化敷揚神功),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may instruct all Bodhisattvas to attain sudden enlightenment in the Great Vehicle (願教諸菩薩頓悟大乘),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Celestial Jade Emperor** may **cover and protect all beings**, loving them as his own children,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that for the sake of **delivering all beings**, I may manifest as the **Jade Maiden** (玉女身),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that I may manifest **rare and wondrous forms** to **illuminate all the heavens**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao** may be **proclaimed and transformed** for both **humans and Celestials**, endless and profound,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **great compassion and great pity** may radiantly flow, illuminating the **Dharma Wheel** (法轮),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that through **countless kalpas** (劫) I may **transform and demonstrate** the **great divine powers** (大神通),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that in accordance with **all directions** (十方), I may manifest and **benefit all beings** (群生),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **teachings of the Dao** may be **universally bestowed**, and **enlightenment** may be **widely opened**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that with **compassionate thoughts** for the **common folk** (苍生), I may **universally release** the **divine radiance** (神光),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao** may be **proclaimed and transformed** from **heaven to earth**, manifesting the **divine wisdom** (神明),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Five Sacred Mountains** (五岳) may be **stabilized and pacified**, bringing **national prosperity** and **people’s well-being**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **pitying compassion** may be **solely invoked** to speak of **beneficial matters**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **innumerable beings** may be **delivered** and **liberated from the suffering of birth and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **intentions of expedient means** may flourish, opening the **gate of benefit**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Jade Repository Scriptures** (玉匮科) may be **proclaimed**, and the **sacred, ineffable laws** (灵宝法) transmitted,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that I may **support the perilous**, **extract the suffering**, and **benefit those facing life and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **blessings** may descend upon all **heavenly beings**, while **poisons and calamities** are **dispelled below**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Divine Sovereign** may **take pity** upon my humble followers and **expound these profound truths**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **teachings** may be **universally transmitted** in all **directions** (十方), **covering and protecting** those who **receive and uphold** them,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **land and its people** may be **protected and stabilized**, and all **beings liberated from birth and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that through **vast kalpas** (浩劫) I may **transform and guide** the **ancient and modern**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **wondrous sutras** may now be **expounded**, and the **Divine Sovereign** may **take pity** upon all **sentient beings**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **heavenly and human beings** may be **protected** from the **four calamities and five decays** (四相五衰),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **great earthly prisons** (大地狱) may be **broken**, and **heavy crimes and sufferings** (重罪苦) liberated,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **violent and evil demons** (暴恶魔) may be **subdued**, and all **lands protected**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

---
**The Jade Edicts** (玉诰) are **now fully proclaimed**, and each has **paid homage in one bow**.
I, with reverent heart, **return to the Dao** (皈神), **return to my true nature** (皈身),
And **submit my life** to the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.
With deep reflection, I recall that my **disciples** (弟子), including myself, have **received the Emperor’s grace** across **countless kalpas** (旷劫),
And in **every lifetime** (累生) have **benefited from His transformation** (蒙化).
Yet, with **foolish and ignorant** (愚迷) disposition, we have **stained ourselves with profound and heavy sins** (深重之愆),
And **dare not fail to repent**.

With **humble sincerity and fervent devotion**, I **submit my earnest plea**,
Hoping to **earn Your forgiveness** (原赦).
I **revere and follow the sacred teachings** (教典), and thus **submit in homage**.
Now I **pray for the cessation of obstacles** (断障) and **the removal of sins** (除愆),
Hoping to **dispel calamities and gather blessings** (消灾集福),
To **fulfill my heart’s wishes** (随心满愿),
And **attain the truth of the Saints** (证圣成真).

I **request permission** to **proclaim the repentance rites** (忏法),
And **first seek the descent of the True Spirit** (真灵之降鉴).
May I **earn Your mercy** (哀悯),
And thus **achieve forgiveness and removal of sins** (原除).

---
**My fervent prayers are:**
That the world may be **like jasper**, with the **nine-colored radiant wheels** (九色琼轮) converging;
That the **Daoist path** may be **like gold and emerald**, with the **tenfold wondrous feathered canopies** (十绝羽盖) soaring.
May the **divine winds** (灵风) play **harmonious music** (奏乐),
And the **precious flowers** (宝花) form a **canopy** (成盖) to **cover all** (徧覆).
May the **conch and phoenix** (鸾啸凤唱) resound,
And the **dragon and lingzhi** (龙戏麟盘) dance,
So that all may **fly downward from the celestial realm** (翔下於天端),
And the **times may all be illuminated** in the **mortal world** (光临於凡界).
Thus, may **heavenly and human beings** rejoice,
And **guilt and retribution** be **cleansed and removed** (罪咎之蠲除).
If my prayers are **granted**, how could my **wishes be more fulfilled** (至愿)!

I, with my **disciples**, bow in **homage with resolute hearts**,
And **pay thanks** to the **Supreme, Most High Three Treasures** (无上至真三宝).

---
**The Supreme Jade Emperor’s Fulfilled Wishes** (满愿宝忏卷) **are now complete**,
**The Supreme Jade Emperor’s Fulfilled Wishes** (满愿宝忏卷) **are now complete**,
**Praise and Admiration** (赞叹).

---
With **fasting and purification**, I serve the **Emperor**,
Hoping that **filth and impurities** (斋戒事帝) may **be subtly transformed** (肸蠁以潜通).
With **fragrant incense**, I **awaken the Divine** (感神),
And **ascend through the rising mist** (仗氤氲而上达).

---
I **reverently offer** the **scented Dao** (道香),
The **virtue-scented Dao** (德香),
The **wisdom-scented Dao** (慧香),
The **effortless Dao** (无为香),
The **serene and tranquil Dao** (清静香),
The **spontaneous Dao** (自然香),
The **marvelous, true Dao** (妙洞真香),
The **Dao transcending the Three Realms** (超三界香),
And the **Dao of the Three Realms’ Truth** (三境真香),
Filling the **Jade Palace of the Mysterious Vault** (琼楼玉京),
Spanning the **heavenly laws of the Ten Directions** (天法界),
And **universally extending** my **offerings of devotion** (供养).

---
**The Sutra Master**, **Primordial Beginning Celestial Sovereign** (元始天尊),
**The Jade Emperor**, **Lord of the Dao** (玉帝道君天尊),
**The Celestial Sovereign of Moral Transformation** (道德天尊),
And the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝),
**The Emperor, Radiant King of Auspicious and Strict Wondrous Music** (光严妙乐国王),
**The Empress, Precious Moon of Auspicious Light** (宝月光皇后),
And **The Awakened King, High and Pure Celestial Sovereign** (高虚清明天主帝君),
Who **embodies the Pure and Natural Awakening** (清净自然觉王如来).

---
I **inquire of the Jade Void Celestial Sovereign** (玉虚上帝),
The **Broad Heaven Celestial Sovereign** (昊天上帝),
The **Five Elders of the Three Elements** (三元三官大帝),
The **Four Saints of the Northern Pole** (北极四圣真君),
The **Southern Star, Northern Dipper, and the Auspicious Radiance of the Heavenly Cycle** (南辰北斗、周天利曜),
The **Cluster of True Ones Supporting the Pole** (拱极群真),
The **Golden Immortals of the Great Vehicle** (三世金仙大乘菩萨),
The **Ten-Direction Saints of Supreme Holiness** (十方至圣无量帝君),
The **True Person of Resonant Voice and Saving Suffering** (寻声救苦真人),
The **True Person of Compassionate Liberation from Calamity** (慈悲度厄真人),
The **True Person of Delivering Life and Crossing Death** (济生度死真人),
The **True Person of Ten-Thousand Blessings and Body Protection** (万福护身真人),
The **True Person of Wondrous Conduct** (妙行真人),
The **Jade Maidens of Night Light** (夜光玉女),
The **Jade Consorts of Divine Spirit** (灵妃玉女),
And **all Primordial Lords** (一切元君),
The **Heavenly True Humans and Celestial Sovereigns** (天真皇人一切大仙),
The **Three Heavenly Lawmasters Supporting the Dao and Aiding the Primordial** (三天扶教辅元大法天师真君),
The **Nine Heavenly Sovereigns of Transformation and Prosperity** (九天开化司禄宏仁帝君),
The **Sovereign of Pure Yang and Auspicious Transformation** (演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君),
The **Pure and Clear Sovereign Lord of the Celestial Teachings** (清微教主紫虚保仙元君),
And the **scripture masters** of the **Schools of Lingbao, Daode, Zhengyi, and Quan Zheng** (灵宝、道德、正一、全真),
Who **proclaim the teachings, expound the Dao, and guide disciples** (演法垂文授道阐教宣科度人师尊),
And **all the celestial assemblies** (一切仙众),
The **celestial generals of thunder and lightning** (雷霆诸司天将),
The **officials of sacred talismans and ordination seals** (法箓印令官君),
The **Ten-Direction Flying Celestial Kings** (十方飞天神王),
The **True Sovereigns of the Five Sacred Mountains** (五岳真君),
The **holy beings of earth and water** (地水圣众),
And the **city gods, plague gods, and community gods** (城隍瘟火社令等神),
The **ten-thousand spirits of the Three Realms and Four Palaces** (三界四府万灵),
And the **Ten-Direction Saints who respond to invocation** (十方应感列圣).

With utmost sincerity, we offer true incense, universally sharing in the act of veneration.
With reverence, we await Heaven’s benevolence, humbly hoping for Your gracious inspection.

Your humble servant, with sincere devotion, now presents our heartfelt wishes, earnestly seeking divine response, and in this auspicious moment of the Double Fifth Festival, we humbly lay out our sincere offerings—incense and flowers arranged for reverence, lamps and fruits spread for devotion—humbly hoping that You may temporarily depart Your celestial court and graciously descend to our mortal feast.

May You, in Your compassion, observe our sincere devotion, and accept our humble gratitude as fragrant offerings;
May You, in Your wisdom, heed our earnest prayers, and fulfill our modest sincerity like the lowliest grass.

With reverence, we stand before Your august spirit, proclaiming the Law of Repentance.
All gathered in the Dao/Way Hall, each with focused mind, kneel in long obeisance and perform repentance according to the rites.

The undersigned, a disciple of the Great Dao under the leadership of the official in charge of sacred talismans, [Name], respectfully records the names of the disciples [Names], and with utmost sincerity, humbly present our petition to:

The Three Pure Ones of Ultimate Reality,
The Jade Emperor, Sovereign of Heaven,
The Celestial Parents,
The Most Sacred and Most True,
The Three Treasures of the Three Realms,
All True Spirits.

Your humble servants have heard that:
The Purple-Golden Celestial Gate and the White-Jade Capital of Jade,
Dwell within the realm of wondrous existence,
High above the heavens of profound truth.
With Dao/Way perfected and virtues complete,
Your sublime form surpasses all celestial beings;
With boundless heart and expansive body,
Your benevolent light illuminates the Three Realms.

You descend teachings directly, pointing out the lost path,
Your station is peerless, unmatched—
Sovereign of the Most Mysterious and Most Wondrous.
Heaven and humankind rely upon You,
True Saint and Patriarch of the Dao/Way,
Great Saint of boundless compassion,
Great Being of vast aspiration.

Unprecedented in antiquity, beyond all praise.
Your humble servant [Name] and others, with no words to express our deepest reverence and exaltation,
Together with all past ancestors, living kin, beings of the dusty world, and souls in endless night,
Prostrate in utmost devotion,
Take refuge in reverence, chant Your sacred name,
Contemplate Your honored form,
Follow Your teachings with sincerity,
And pray according to the scriptures.

[The assembly recites:] The Imperial Edict of Jade Sovereignty—once, each bowing once.

**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who are bound by afflictions attain rebirth in the Pure Lands.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all treasures and wealth be generously dispersed.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all hidden and revealed beings—both ordinary and holy—universally partake in the Celestial Grace.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who behold this radiant light gather in homage.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all beings universally attain Daoic transformation.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all realms of Hell universally submit to the **Light Power** of Virtue.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all suffering beings be born into the Celestial Realms.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all rejoice today in the **Mystic Virtue**, gazing upward.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who behold the Compassionate Countenance be universally protected and guided.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May the Six Ordinary and Four Holy Beings all partake in the Daoic shelter.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May the common folk of the final age all attain longevity and blessings.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who share in suffering and guilt be universally protected and guided.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who partake in this triumph attain rebirth in Heaven.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all beings universally partake in this triumph.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all evil deeds be utterly annihilated.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all demons and heterodox teachings be universally subdued.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all poisons and malevolent influences be utterly annihilated.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who hold desires in their hearts attain their wishes.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May the **Great Celestial Emperor** open and transform, granting universal salvation to all beings.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who bear children in their wombs attain safe and auspicious births.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May the boundless and peerless **Divine Penetration** universally oversee and deliver all beings.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all rejoice today in the radiant light.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all who hear these words universally attain enlightenment.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May the assembly of the Law revere and uphold the Daoic teachings.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May this **Sutra** of exalted and wondrous **Virtue** universally deliver all beings.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all the people sing in praise of the flourishing of Heaven.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all short-lived beings attain long life.**

**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May all whose hearts hold requests universally receive fulfillment.**
**With sincere devotion, we pay homage and surrender,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****,
**May this wondrous Law be kept secret and confer universal blessings upon all sentient beings.**

**All** [prostrate],
**The Imperial Edict of the **Celestial Sovereign****,
**One recitation.**
**With sincere devotion, we surrender to the **Divine** and to the **Body** and **Command** of the Dao,**
**The **Great Celestial Emperor of Heaven****, **The **Highest Sovereign of the Mystic Vault****.
**The **Celestial Sovereign** ponders deeply that each of us, your humble disciples, holds sincere intentions—**
**How could there be any who do not wish?**

How could there be but one heart when all desires differ?
Each holds their own longings—some seek to save the people and benefit all beings,
Yet what is truly essential is to seek the Dao and attain the True.

Those bound in suffering only wish for advancement,
The poor and destitute long for wealth and honor,
Ever waiting until their desires are fulfilled before release.

Yet, contemplating the wondrous Dao’s boundless compassion,
It grants all sentient beings their deepest wishes.

Thus, we dare to surrender our lives,
Seeking to follow the will of others.

Humbly, we pray for Your gracious inspection of our sincere devotion,
Still relying on the Dao’s adaptability to respond to our needs.

First, we pray for the protection of the nation and its people;
Next, we hope to benefit others while benefiting ourselves.

Whether in the unseen or the seen,
From ancient times to the present,
May all living descendants be cherished in peace,
And all ancestors past be universally liberated.

May blessings reach the Nine Hells and dispel their suffering,
And merit shine through the endless night.

Together with all beings, may we depend on the multitude of virtues.

With sincere devotion, we prostrate and give thanks to the **Supreme Void Sovereign of the Three Jewels**.

**Dedication:**
As human nature is dutiful, may those who do good receive a hundred blessings;
As the Emperor’s mercy is boundless, may Heaven’s aid rest upon **virtue alone**.

Previously, we, the disciples of the Dao, reverently addressed the Great Way,
Bowing in homage before You, presenting the *Supreme Scripture of the Mystic Vault’s Highest Treasure: The Celestial Sovereign’s Fulfilled Wish and Expiation*, in its entirety—ten volumes complete.

May this merit be dedicated solely for disciple [name]’s repentance, dispelling calamity, prolonging life, and gathering joyous fortune.

Humbly, we pray that human sentiment may resonate with the Divine,
And that the Celestial Sovereign may observe and grant our wishes.

May obstacles be removed, sins atoned,
And all desires fulfilled to their utmost.
May disasters be averted and blessings gathered,
And the Mystic Virtue attain perfect fruition.

Together with all sentient beings,
May we attain the **Supreme Dao**,
Take refuge in the Three Jewels,
And dedicate ourselves to the Nine Purity Realms,
As the supreme cause and condition,
With sincere devotion, we invoke:

**The Most Holy Primordial Celestial Sovereign,**
**The Sovereign of the Highest Clarity’s Treasure,**
**The Sovereign of the Supreme Dao’s Virtue,**
**The Celestial Sovereign Who Forgives Transgressions.**

**Unfathomable, boundless merit.**

*The Tenth Volume of the Highest Treasure: The Celestial Sovereign’s Fulfilled Display and Expiation* is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 高上玉皇满愿宝忏 经名：高上玉皇满愿宝忏。 十卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部威仪类。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之一 序教 忏仪 斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清静香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教降生天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清静自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，天地始祖五老上帝，寻声救苦、慈悲度厄、济生度死、万福护身四大真人，夜光玉女、一切元君，天真皇人一切大仙，北极佑圣真君玄天上帝，三天扶教辅元大法天师，九天开化主宰灵应帝君，演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君，应感妙通慈济朱真人，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，大慈永元普济显灵广佑罗真君，清微、灵宝、道德、正一诸阶演法垂文授受诸大祖师真人仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓吏兵，飞天大圣无极神王妙行真人，灵妃玉女、十方三界、诸天地水诸大真人，一时会中、无量圣众，悉伏真香，普同供养。 臣今奏为某府某县某处居，奉道臣某　所伸凡悃，干冒天威，仰望洪慈，俯从丹祷。 以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱，香花罗列以归依，灯果广陈而供养，恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳切，副草芥之微诚。 恭对天慈，宣扬忏法。 道场众等人　各运心长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领录奉大道弟子某等谨虔诚上启，三清至真，玉皇尊帝，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻七宝玄苑，玉皇殿宫，演今本行之因缘，言昔往时之胜事。 国王净德勑祷太子而未传，皇后月光梦感道君而抱送，幼而敏慧，长而仁慈，舍国以付大臣，入山而修至道，证成玉帝，号曰金仙。 大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，着想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众哗，玉诰曰： 太上弥罗无上天。 妙有玄真境，渺渺紫金阙。 太微玉清宫，无极无上圣。 廓落发光明，寂寂浩无宗。 玄范总十方，湛寂真常道。 恢漠大神通，玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝。 各一拜 臣等志心归命礼，愿举六通力放大光明，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿分身十方诸大天宫，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿大光明殿升光明座，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿演说清静解脱之道，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿出大妙音普告十方，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿神通不动移接天人，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿拯救众生令得安乐，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿广行方便助国救人，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿启诸道藏演说灵章，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿恢宣正化敷扬神功，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿教诸菩萨顿悟大乘，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。
chunks.translated_text:
**Highest Celestial Jade Emperor's Supreme Wish and Precious Repentance Sutra**
*Ten volumes.* Source text: *Zhengtong Daozang* (正统道藏), *Tongzhen* (洞真) section, *Rituals and Etiquette* (威仪) category.

---

**Volume the First**
**Preface to the Teachings**
**Repentance Ritual**

Offering incense to the Daoist Emperor, hoping that my humble sincerity may reach the heavens;
Sending fragrant offerings to the gods, relying on the rising *qi* (氤氲) to ascend.

With reverence, I present the *Dao* incense, the *virtue/power* (德) incense, the *wisdom* (慧) incense, the *non-action* (無為) incense, the *purity and tranquility* (清靜) incense, the *natural* (自然) incense, the *wondrous primordial truth* (妙洞真) incense, the *transcendent Three Realms* (超三界) incense, and the *Three Realms of Truth* (三境真) incense. These fill the celestial palace of jade and golden lights, pervade the *Dharma Realm* (法界) of the entire cosmos, and universally extend offerings.

The preceptor of this Sutra is the **Primordial Sovereign of the Beginning of Dao** (元始天尊) who embraces and presents the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Lord of the Dao** (玉帝道君天尊), the **Sage of the Transmitted Holy Teachings, Born from the Dao** (流演聖教降生天尊), the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Great Sage of All Heavenly Manifestations** (諸天化身玉皇大天尊), and the **Highest Celestial Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玄穹高上帝). The **Emperor-Father of Radiant Majesty and Wondrous Joy** (帝父光嚴妙樂國王), the **Empress-Mother of Precious Moonlight, the Celestial Consort** (帝母寶月光皇后), and the **Awakened King of Purity and Naturalness, the Sage of Highest Emptiness and Clarity** (清靜自然覺王如來高虛清明天主帝君).

I respectfully invoke the **Highest Celestial Sovereign of Jade Emptiness** (玉虚上帝), the **Supreme Celestial Sovereign of the Boundless Heaven** (昊天上帝), the **Great Bodhisattvas of the Golden Immortals across the Three Ages** (三世金仙大乘菩薩), the **Boundless Saints of Ten Directions** (十方至聖無量帝君), the **Primordial Ancestors of Heaven and Earth** (天地始祖五老上帝), the **Four Great True Persons of Responsive Mercy, Compassionate Liberation, Deliverance of Life and Death, and Infinite Blessings for Protection** (寻聲救苦、慈悲度厄、濟生度死、萬福護身四大真人), the **Luminous Jade Maiden** (夜光玉女), and the **All Primordial Lords** (一切元君). All the **Celestial True Persons of the Pure and Natural** (天真皇人一切大仙), the **Aid-Sage, Lord of the Northern Pole, Mysterious Celestial Sovereign** (北極佑聖真君玄天上帝), the **Nine-Heaven Exalted Lawmasters of Teaching and Assisting the Primordial** (三天扶教輔元大法天師), the **Nine-Heaven Sovereign of Manifestation and Response, Lord of the Spirit’s Answer** (九天開化主宰靈應帝君), the **Sovereign of Pure and Correct Enlightenment, Lord of Benevolent Aid** (演正警化純陽孚佑帝君), the **True Person of Responsive Compassion and Wondrous Communication, Lord of Benevolent Rescue** (應感妙通慈濟朱真人), the **True Person of the Mysterious Dao and Benevolent Guidance, Jade Hare White Sage** (洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人), the **Great Sage of Universal Benevolence, Infinite Mercy, and Manifested Aid, Lord of Extensive Protection** (大慈永元普濟顯靈廣佑羅真君), and the **Ancestral Sages of all stages—Pure and Mysterious, Spirit Treasure, Dao Virtue, and Rectified Unity** (清微、靈寶、道德、正一諸階演法垂文授受諸大祖師真人仙眾), as well as the **Celestial Marshals of Thunderous Authority** (雷霆諸司天將), the **clerks and soldiers of the Daoist talismans** (法箓吏兵), the **Mystic Sage of the Boundless Flight, Lord of Wondrous Conduct** (飛天大聖無極神王妙行真人), the **Spiritual Consorts and Jade Maidens** (靈妃玉女), the **Great True Persons of Ten Directions, Three Realms, and All Heavenly and Earthly Waters** (十方三界、諸天地水諸大真人), and the **Infinite Sacred Assembly present in this gathering** (一時會中、無量聖眾).

All kneel with devout hearts, offering incense in accordance with the ritual.
The **Daoist official of talismans** (具箓職臣某) humbly records and presents this to the **disciple of the Great Dao** (奉大道弟子某等), with utmost sincerity and piety.

---

**My Humble Petition**
I, a disciple of the Dao residing in the [certain] prefecture, [certain] county, and [certain] locality (臣今奏為某府某縣某處居), with sincere devotion (奉道臣某 所伸凡悃), dare to offend the celestial authority (干冒天威), and with reverence, seek the Emperor’s boundless mercy (仰望洪慈), while humbly following the ritual of incense (俯從丹祷).

On this auspicious day of the fifth month (谷旦), I present my offerings with utmost sincerity (式展刍忱), arranging incense and flowers in devotion (香花羅列以歸依), setting forth lamps and fruits for universal sustenance (燈果廣陳而供養). I humbly pray for a temporary respite from the celestial court (恭望暫離帝闕), so that the Emperor may graciously descend to this mortal assembly (款駐凡筵).

Looking down upon my earnest sincerity (俯察精虔), the Emperor beholds the gratitude of the humble (鑒苹蘩之報謝).
Piercing my heartfelt pleas (洞矜懇切), the Emperor responds to the sincerity of the lowly (副草芥之微誠).

With reverence, I face the divine mercy (恭對天慈), proclaiming and extolling the method of repentance (宣揚忏法).

---

**The Celestial Decree**
The assembly responds: *"The Celestial Edict!"* (眾哗，玉詔曰)

**The Highest Supreme Lord of Boundless Dao,**
The realm of **Mysterious Possession** (妙有玄真境),
Vast and distant, the **Purple-Gold Celestial Gate** (渺渺紫金闕).
The **Pure and Mysterious Palace of the Highest Celestial** (太微玉清宮),
The **Boundless Supreme Sage** (無極無上聖).
Radiant and descending (廓落發光明),
Silent and boundless (寂寂浩無宗).
The **Primordial Pattern encompasses all Ten Directions** (玄範總十方),
The **Dao of Eternal Stillness and True Constancy** (湛寂真常道).
The **Great Sage of Boundless Transformation** (恢漠大神通),
The **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝).

**Each bows once.**
I, with resolute heart, submit in homage (臣等志心歸命禮),
Praying that the **Six Supernatural Powers** may be employed to radiate the **Great Light** (願舉六通力放大光明),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝).

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Ten-Directional Heavenly Palaces** may be graced with divine presence (願分身十方諸大天宮),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Palace of Great Light** may ascend to the **Seat of Radiance** (願大光明殿升光明座),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao of Purity and Liberation** may be expounded (願演說清靜解脫之道),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Great Mystic Sound** may proclaim to all Ten Directions (願出大妙音普告十方),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Divine Transformation** may remain undisturbed, bridging heaven and man (願神通不動移接天人),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may rescue all beings, granting them peace and joy (願拯救眾生令得安樂),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may widely employ expedient means to aid the state and save the people (願廣行方便助國救人),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Daoist Canon** may be opened to expound the **Sacred Scriptures** (願啟諸道藏演說靈章),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Rectified Transformation** may be proclaimed and the divine virtues extolled (願恢宣正化敷揚神功),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Sage** may instruct all Bodhisattvas to attain sudden enlightenment in the Great Vehicle (願教諸菩薩頓悟大乘),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

chunks.original_text: 臣等志心归命礼，愿覆护众生爱於赤子，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿为度群生现玉女身，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿现希有相上照诸天，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿开化人天教道无穷，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿大慈大悲流焕法轮，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿多劫行化示大神通，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿应现随方利济群生，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿普垂教法开悟，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿慈念苍生普放神光，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿生天立地开化神明，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿施镇五岳安国康民，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿惟愿慈悲说利益事，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿无量度人拔生死苦，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿兴方便意开利益门，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿宣玉匮科传灵宝法，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿扶危拔苦利益存亡，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿上福诸天下消毒害，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿愍臣等故演斯妙义，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿遍传十方覆护受持，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿保镇国土拔度生死，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿生浩劫前运化古今，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿今说妙经愍念有情，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿保护天人四相五衰，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿破大地狱拔重罪苦，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 臣等志心归命礼，愿降暴恶魔护诸国土，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 众□玉诰一遍毕，各一拜 臣等皈神皈身，皈命玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝，重念弟子某等旷劫受恩，累生蒙化，恨以愚迷之性格染成深重之愆，尤敢不悔。 陈庸力精虔之恳请，以干原赦。 仰遵教典以皈依，方祈断障以除愆。 惟冀消灾而集福，随心满愿，证圣成真。 容陈忏法之宣行，首望真灵之降鉴。 庶蒙哀悯，即遂原除。 伏愿世若琉璃，九色琼轮之辐辏； 仙乘金碧，十绝羽盖之飞扬。 灵风奏乐以相和，宝花成盖而徧覆。 鸾啸凤唱，龙戏麟盘，普皆翔下於天端，时悉光临於凡界。 俾天人之悦庆，获罪咎之蠲除。 倘副所求，曷胜至愿。 臣与弟子某等志心稽首，礼谢无上至真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之一竟 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之二 赞叹 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清静香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教道德天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清净自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天利曜、拱极群真，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，寻声救苦真人，慈悲度厄真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，天真皇人一切大仙，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君，清微教主紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文授道阐教宣科度人师尊、一切仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火社令等神，三界四府万灵、十方应感列圣。
chunks.translated_text:
I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Celestial Jade Emperor** may **cover and protect all beings**, loving them as his own children,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that for the sake of **delivering all beings**, I may manifest as the **Jade Maiden** (玉女身),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that I may manifest **rare and wondrous forms** to **illuminate all the heavens**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao** may be **proclaimed and transformed** for both **humans and Celestials**, endless and profound,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **great compassion and great pity** may radiantly flow, illuminating the **Dharma Wheel** (法轮),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that through **countless kalpas** (劫) I may **transform and demonstrate** the **great divine powers** (大神通),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that in accordance with **all directions** (十方), I may manifest and **benefit all beings** (群生),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **teachings of the Dao** may be **universally bestowed**, and **enlightenment** may be **widely opened**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that with **compassionate thoughts** for the **common folk** (苍生), I may **universally release** the **divine radiance** (神光),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Dao** may be **proclaimed and transformed** from **heaven to earth**, manifesting the **divine wisdom** (神明),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Five Sacred Mountains** (五岳) may be **stabilized and pacified**, bringing **national prosperity** and **people’s well-being**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **pitying compassion** may be **solely invoked** to speak of **beneficial matters**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **innumerable beings** may be **delivered** and **liberated from the suffering of birth and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **intentions of expedient means** may flourish, opening the **gate of benefit**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Jade Repository Scriptures** (玉匮科) may be **proclaimed**, and the **sacred, ineffable laws** (灵宝法) transmitted,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that I may **support the perilous**, **extract the suffering**, and **benefit those facing life and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **blessings** may descend upon all **heavenly beings**, while **poisons and calamities** are **dispelled below**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **Divine Sovereign** may **take pity** upon my humble followers and **expound these profound truths**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **teachings** may be **universally transmitted** in all **directions** (十方), **covering and protecting** those who **receive and uphold** them,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **land and its people** may be **protected and stabilized**, and all **beings liberated from birth and death**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that through **vast kalpas** (浩劫) I may **transform and guide** the **ancient and modern**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **wondrous sutras** may now be **expounded**, and the **Divine Sovereign** may **take pity** upon all **sentient beings**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **heavenly and human beings** may be **protected** from the **four calamities and five decays** (四相五衰),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that the **great earthly prisons** (大地狱) may be **broken**, and **heavy crimes and sufferings** (重罪苦) liberated,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

I, with resolute heart, submit in homage,
Praying that **violent and evil demons** (暴恶魔) may be **subdued**, and all **lands protected**,
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

---
**The Jade Edicts** (玉诰) are **now fully proclaimed**, and each has **paid homage in one bow**.
I, with reverent heart, **return to the Dao** (皈神), **return to my true nature** (皈身),
And **submit my life** to the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.
With deep reflection, I recall that my **disciples** (弟子), including myself, have **received the Emperor’s grace** across **countless kalpas** (旷劫),
And in **every lifetime** (累生) have **benefited from His transformation** (蒙化).
Yet, with **foolish and ignorant** (愚迷) disposition, we have **stained ourselves with profound and heavy sins** (深重之愆),
And **dare not fail to repent**.

With **humble sincerity and fervent devotion**, I **submit my earnest plea**,
Hoping to **earn Your forgiveness** (原赦).
I **revere and follow the sacred teachings** (教典), and thus **submit in homage**.
Now I **pray for the cessation of obstacles** (断障) and **the removal of sins** (除愆),
Hoping to **dispel calamities and gather blessings** (消灾集福),
To **fulfill my heart’s wishes** (随心满愿),
And **attain the truth of the Saints** (证圣成真).

I **request permission** to **proclaim the repentance rites** (忏法),
And **first seek the descent of the True Spirit** (真灵之降鉴).
May I **earn Your mercy** (哀悯),
And thus **achieve forgiveness and removal of sins** (原除).

---
**My fervent prayers are:**
That the world may be **like jasper**, with the **nine-colored radiant wheels** (九色琼轮) converging;
That the **Daoist path** may be **like gold and emerald**, with the **tenfold wondrous feathered canopies** (十绝羽盖) soaring.
May the **divine winds** (灵风) play **harmonious music** (奏乐),
And the **precious flowers** (宝花) form a **canopy** (成盖) to **cover all** (徧覆).
May the **conch and phoenix** (鸾啸凤唱) resound,
And the **dragon and lingzhi** (龙戏麟盘) dance,
So that all may **fly downward from the celestial realm** (翔下於天端),
And the **times may all be illuminated** in the **mortal world** (光临於凡界).
Thus, may **heavenly and human beings** rejoice,
And **guilt and retribution** be **cleansed and removed** (罪咎之蠲除).
If my prayers are **granted**, how could my **wishes be more fulfilled** (至愿)!

I, with my **disciples**, bow in **homage with resolute hearts**,
And **pay thanks** to the **Supreme, Most High Three Treasures** (无上至真三宝).

---
**The Supreme Jade Emperor’s Fulfilled Wishes** (满愿宝忏卷) **are now complete**,
**The Supreme Jade Emperor’s Fulfilled Wishes** (满愿宝忏卷) **are now complete**,
**Praise and Admiration** (赞叹).

---
With **fasting and purification**, I serve the **Emperor**,
Hoping that **filth and impurities** (斋戒事帝) may **be subtly transformed** (肸蠁以潜通).
With **fragrant incense**, I **awaken the Divine** (感神),
And **ascend through the rising mist** (仗氤氲而上达).

---
I **reverently offer** the **scented Dao** (道香),
The **virtue-scented Dao** (德香),
The **wisdom-scented Dao** (慧香),
The **effortless Dao** (无为香),
The **serene and tranquil Dao** (清静香),
The **spontaneous Dao** (自然香),
The **marvelous, true Dao** (妙洞真香),
The **Dao transcending the Three Realms** (超三界香),
And the **Dao of the Three Realms’ Truth** (三境真香),
Filling the **Jade Palace of the Mysterious Vault** (琼楼玉京),
Spanning the **heavenly laws of the Ten Directions** (天法界),
And **universally extending** my **offerings of devotion** (供养).

---
**The Sutra Master**, **Primordial Beginning Celestial Sovereign** (元始天尊),
**The Jade Emperor**, **Lord of the Dao** (玉帝道君天尊),
**The Celestial Sovereign of Moral Transformation** (道德天尊),
And the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault** (玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝),
**The Emperor, Radiant King of Auspicious and Strict Wondrous Music** (光严妙乐国王),
**The Empress, Precious Moon of Auspicious Light** (宝月光皇后),
And **The Awakened King, High and Pure Celestial Sovereign** (高虚清明天主帝君),
Who **embodies the Pure and Natural Awakening** (清净自然觉王如来).

---
I **inquire of the Jade Void Celestial Sovereign** (玉虚上帝),
The **Broad Heaven Celestial Sovereign** (昊天上帝),
The **Five Elders of the Three Elements** (三元三官大帝),
The **Four Saints of the Northern Pole** (北极四圣真君),
The **Southern Star, Northern Dipper, and the Auspicious Radiance of the Heavenly Cycle** (南辰北斗、周天利曜),
The **Cluster of True Ones Supporting the Pole** (拱极群真),
The **Golden Immortals of the Great Vehicle** (三世金仙大乘菩萨),
The **Ten-Direction Saints of Supreme Holiness** (十方至圣无量帝君),
The **True Person of Resonant Voice and Saving Suffering** (寻声救苦真人),
The **True Person of Compassionate Liberation from Calamity** (慈悲度厄真人),
The **True Person of Delivering Life and Crossing Death** (济生度死真人),
The **True Person of Ten-Thousand Blessings and Body Protection** (万福护身真人),
The **True Person of Wondrous Conduct** (妙行真人),
The **Jade Maidens of Night Light** (夜光玉女),
The **Jade Consorts of Divine Spirit** (灵妃玉女),
And **all Primordial Lords** (一切元君),
The **Heavenly True Humans and Celestial Sovereigns** (天真皇人一切大仙),
The **Three Heavenly Lawmasters Supporting the Dao and Aiding the Primordial** (三天扶教辅元大法天师真君),
The **Nine Heavenly Sovereigns of Transformation and Prosperity** (九天开化司禄宏仁帝君),
The **Sovereign of Pure Yang and Auspicious Transformation** (演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君),
The **Pure and Clear Sovereign Lord of the Celestial Teachings** (清微教主紫虚保仙元君),
And the **scripture masters** of the **Schools of Lingbao, Daode, Zhengyi, and Quan Zheng** (灵宝、道德、正一、全真),
Who **proclaim the teachings, expound the Dao, and guide disciples** (演法垂文授道阐教宣科度人师尊),
And **all the celestial assemblies** (一切仙众),
The **celestial generals of thunder and lightning** (雷霆诸司天将),
The **officials of sacred talismans and ordination seals** (法箓印令官君),
The **Ten-Direction Flying Celestial Kings** (十方飞天神王),
The **True Sovereigns of the Five Sacred Mountains** (五岳真君),
The **holy beings of earth and water** (地水圣众),
And the **city gods, plague gods, and community gods** (城隍瘟火社令等神),
The **ten-thousand spirits of the Three Realms and Four Palaces** (三界四府万灵),
And the **Ten-Direction Saints who respond to invocation** (十方应感列圣).

Praying that the **Rectified Transformation** may be proclaimed and the divine virtues extolled (願恢宣正化敷揚神功),
To the **Celestial Jade Emperor, Highest Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault**.

Praying that the **Sage** may instruct all Bodhisattvas to attain sudden enlightenment in the Great Vehicle (願教諸菩薩頓悟大乘),

With utmost sincerity, we offer true incense, universally sharing in the act of veneration.
With reverence, we await Heaven’s benevolence, humbly hoping for Your gracious inspection.

Your humble servant, with sincere devotion, now presents our heartfelt wishes, earnestly seeking divine response, and in this auspicious moment of the Double Fifth Festival, we humbly lay out our sincere offerings—incense and flowers arranged for reverence, lamps and fruits spread for devotion—humbly hoping that You may temporarily depart Your celestial court and graciously descend to our mortal feast.

May You, in Your compassion, observe our sincere devotion, and accept our humble gratitude as fragrant offerings;
May You, in Your wisdom, heed our earnest prayers, and fulfill our modest sincerity like the lowliest grass.

With reverence, we stand before Your august spirit, proclaiming the Law of Repentance.
All gathered in the Dao/Way Hall, each with focused mind, kneel in long obeisance and perform repentance according to the rites.

The undersigned, a disciple of the Great Dao under the leadership of the official in charge of sacred talismans, [Name], respectfully records the names of the disciples [Names], and with utmost sincerity, humbly present our petition to:

The Three Treasures of the Three Realms,
All True Spirits.

Your humble servants have heard that:

High above the heavens of profound truth.
With Dao/Way perfected and virtues complete,
Your sublime form surpasses all celestial beings;
With boundless heart and expansive body,
Your benevolent light illuminates the Three Realms.

You descend teachings directly, pointing out the lost path,
Your station is peerless, unmatched—
Sovereign of the Most Mysterious and Most Wondrous.
Heaven and humankind rely upon You,
True Saint and Patriarch of the Dao/Way,
Great Saint of boundless compassion,
Great Being of vast aspiration.

Unprecedented in antiquity, beyond all praise.
Your humble servant [Name] and others, with no words to express our deepest reverence and exaltation,
Together with all past ancestors, living kin, beings of the dusty world, and souls in endless night,
Prostrate in utmost devotion,
Take refuge in reverence, chant Your sacred name,
Contemplate Your honored form,
Follow Your teachings with sincerity,
And pray according to the scriptures.

chunks.original_text: 上度诸天，下济幽魂。 上无师祖，惟道为身。 丹台紫府，金阙玉京。 秘此妙法，溥福含灵。 灭我万罪，增我遐龄。 万神朝礼，魔王保迎。 功德昌盛，黄箓书名。 渺渺亿劫，使我长存。 臣等志心皈神、皈身皈命，玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 重念臣弟子某等百拜朝天，五体投地，既极赞扬之福力，复伸禳谢之凡忱。 宿罪愆深，仰赖皈依於上圣帝，功德大能，令救度於众生，当如典教以宣扬，姑摭经言而祝愿。 一朝一礼，同德同心，再三望帝以垂怜专一，露香而叹述，容伸丹恳，俯念苍生。 伏愿闭目静思持经，舍除於妄想； 存心默念称号，得睹於慈颜。 仰朝尽得以延生，踊跃普同而来集。 有求皆应，无愿不从。 悉令恳祷之昭通，尚赖始终之护佑。 保昌运於万纪，得威镇於四夷。 道果圆成，善芽增长。 臣某与弟子某等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇至真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之三竟 除罪 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 臣等恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清静香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教道德天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清静自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天列曜、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，清微启教紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，功曹符使，里域灵官，三界万灵、十方真宰。 法筵应感，一切真仙。 悉仗真香，普同供养。 恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。 臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷。 以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱，香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。 恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微忱。 仰对元慈，宣扬忏法。 举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领录奉大道弟子某等谨谨虔诚再拜，上奏三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻：光严国内妙乐土中，圣母凝梦於虚无，道君授子於恍惚。 慈爱和逊，弗贪万乘之尊荣； 忍辱仁柔，不惮亿劫之修累。 十号圆满，万德周身，为天主之至尊，证如来之大觉。 功高无比，德重难逾，大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，着想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众□，玉帝诰曰 太上弥罗无上天。 妙有玄真境，渺渺紫金阙。 太微玉清宫，无极无上圣。 廓落发光明，寂寂浩元宗。

**Supreme Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault, Celestial Emperor of Great Heaven,**

Ascending to bless the heavens above, descending to rescue the lost souls below.
No master or ancestor above—only the Dao as one’s very self.
The Vermilion Terrace and Purple Bureaus, the Golden Gates and Jade Capitals.
This wondrous law is kept in secret, bestowing universal blessings upon all sentient beings.
Erase my ten thousand sins, extend my boundless years.
Ten thousand spirits bow in homage, while demon kings come to escort.
Meritorious deeds flourish, inscribed in the Yellow Register.
Through countless eons, may I endure eternally.

Your servants, with sincere hearts, take refuge in the Divine, in the Body, and in Life—
**Celestial Emperor of Great Heaven, High Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault.**

With deep reflection, your humble disciples, [Name] and others, prostrate in fivefold obeisance to the Heavens, bowing with utmost reverence. Having already extolled the blessings of praise, we now humbly extend our supplications for atonement.

Our past offenses are profound; we rely solely on the refuge of the Most Holy Emperor.
Your boundless virtue rescues all beings—
As the scriptures decree, we proclaim and now humbly pray.

Each morning and evening, with united virtue and heart,
We gaze toward the Emperor with unwavering devotion,
Offering incense and sighing in reverence,
Extending our earnest pleas that You, in Your mercy, regard the common folk.

May we, with closed eyes and focused minds, hold the sutras,
Abandoning all delusion;
May we, with pure hearts, chant Your name,
And thus behold Your compassionate visage.
May we, in our devotion, prolong our lives,
And may all joyfully gather in response.

May every plea be answered, every wish fulfilled.
May our sincere prayers be made manifest,
And may we always rely on Your unwavering protection.
May our fortunes flourish for ten thousand ages,
And may Your might command the four quarters.

The Dao’s fruit ripens fully, and virtuous growth expands.

Your humble servant, [Name], with disciples [Names], prostrate in reverence,
Offering gratitude to the Supreme Void’s Three Treasures of Highest Truth.

**Completion of the Third Volume of the *Precious Repentance Scroll for the Fulfilled Wishes of the Highest Celestial Jade Emperor***

With fasting and purification to serve the Emperor,
Hoping that even insects may secretly communicate;
With fragrant incense stirring the spirits,
And the mist ascending to reach the heights.

Your servants respectfully present the scents of the Dao,
The scent of virtue, wisdom, non-action, purity, naturalness,
The scent of wondrous penetration, transcending the Three Realms,

chunks.original_text: 特垂原赦，庶沐慈悲。 伏愿三业七情，尽逐称扬而洗涤； 十恶五逆，并随跪拜以忏禳。 长为无过之后人，更尽未来之末世。 离凡睹圣，与道合真。 福被於六道三途，惠及於九玄七祖。 悉仗玉光之力，举消尘俗之愆。 寡悔寡尤，尽善尽美。 臣等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇正真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之四竟 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之五 断障 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 臣等恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清净香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教道德天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清净自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天列曜、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演正警化纯阳孚佑帝君，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，清微启教紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，功曹符使，里域灵官，三界万灵，十方真宰。 法筵应感，一切真仙。 悉仗真香，普同供养。 恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。 臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷。 以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱。 香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。 恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微诚。 仰对元慈，宣扬忏法。 举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领录奉大道弟子某等谨谨虔诚再拜，上奏三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻：尊居帝位，高处天宫，分身普现於十方，说法遍及於一切。 定而能应，去来自在，以无拘合而可分，变化圆通而莫测，兴方便意，开利益门。 济沉迷之苦徒，演清净之妙道。 非识可识，自然而然，大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，着想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众□ 太上弥罗无上天。

With deepest hope for Your gracious pardon and mercy,
We earnestly pray to bathe in Your compassion.

May our threefold deeds and seven emotions
Be wholly cleansed through sincere praise and repentance;
May the ten evils and five grievous offenses
Be utterly expiated through prostration and supplication.

Let us become exemplary beings without fault,
And fulfill the final age with unyielding devotion.
Ascend from the mundane to behold the sacred,
And align with the Dao/Way in its true essence.

May blessings extend to the Six Paths and Three Realms,
And grace reach the Nine Mysteries and Seven Ancestors.
Through the power of Your radiant light,
Let all dusty sins be utterly dissolved.

With few regrets and no transgressions,
May we attain perfect virtue and beauty.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage
And gratefully acknowledge the Supreme Void Sovereign’s Three Treasures.

---
**The Fourth and Fifth Volumes of the *Jade Emperor’s Fulfilled Vows Treasure Sutra of Repentance***

In solemn fasting and ritual purity, we serve the Emperor,
Hoping to move the divine through our humble offerings;
With incense’s fragrance, we touch the spirits,
And through its rising mist, ascend to the heights.

We reverently present the scents of Dao/Way, virtue, wisdom,
Non-action, purity, nature, wondrous truth, transcendence beyond the Three Realms,
And the Three Realms’ true fragrance—
Filling the Crystal Capital of the Jade Emperor,
Permeating the Heavenly Law Realm,
And universally offering devotion.

The **Emperor of the Dao/Way Who Embrace-Sends,**
The **Heavenly Sovereign of Moral Teaching and Perfection,**
And the **Jade Emperor, Great Heavenly Lord of Mysterious Vault,**
**Highest Sovereign of the Celestial Vault,**
**Imperial Father, King of Radiant Splendor and Wondrous Joy,**
**Imperial Mother, Precious Moonlight Queen,**
**The Awakened King of Pure Nature, the High Void Pure Bright Heavenly Sovereign.**

To the **Heavenly Sovereign of the Jade Emptiness,**
The **Heavenly Sovereign of the Boundless Sky,**
The **Five Elder Heavenly Sovereigns,**
The **True Persons of Compassionate Salvation, Voice-Seeking Rescue, Life-Saving Death-Redeeming,**
The **True Person of Ten Blessings and Body-Protection,**
The **True Person of Wondrous Conduct,**
The **Night-Light Jade Maiden, the Spirit Consort Jade Maiden,**

You rescue the lost and suffering,

Unfathomable by ordinary perception,

Beyond all praise.

Mortal souls, and wandering spirits of the dark night
May bow in reverence, take refuge, and honor Your name,
Contemplate Your form, and follow Your teachings as scripture dictates.
All present—**the Most High Supreme Lord of the Mirochana.**

chunks.original_text: 重念臣某弟子某等，碍缘不除，魔障未断。 奈何凡人之愚蔽，岂按妙法以能修容。 乃外邪败灵根，而盗至宝乱其妙道，入俗网以堕凡流。 安能澄虑以凝神，未免缘情而逐境。 一真遂丧，万魔来攻，惟仰元尊之垂慈，当宣断障之妙法。 爰伸恳告，按典忏陈。 伏愿拂拭诸尘，莹彻心珠而晃朗； 扫开浮翳，顿使慧目以光明。 锡智慧剑而削愆，除烦恼障而录善。 凡身清净，道果圆谐。 福沾幽显之两途，慧烛圆明之一性。 阴霾去而日朗，浮云散而天明。 长获逍遥，永无流转。 臣等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇至真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之五竟 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之六 消灾 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 臣等恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清净香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝灵宝天尊、流演圣教降生天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清净自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天列曜、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演教警化纯阳孚佑帝君，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，清微启教紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，功曹符使，里域灵官，三界万灵，十方真宰。 法筵应感，一切真仙。 悉仗真香，普同供养，恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。 臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷。 以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱。 香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。 恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微诚。 仰对元慈，宣扬忏法。 举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领录奉大道弟子某等谨谨虔诚，奏启三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻：昔为王嗣，苦建玄功，拯度亿万之生灵，修行三千之余劫。 谅由圣体，故兹胎脏之胚腪； 虽以法身，正本道原而变化。 无比第一，名最上乘，玄理极而幽深，帝功德而重大。 不坏不灭，杳亡杳存，大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，着想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众□ 太上弥罗无上天。

With deepest reflection, we, your humble disciples, acknowledge that our karmic bonds remain unsevered and demonic obstacles unbroken. Alas, the folly of mortal ignorance prevents us from practicing the wondrous Dao with sincerity. Thus, external malevolence corrupts our sacred roots, while thieves of divine treasure disrupt our sublime Way, ensnaring us in the mundane net and casting us into the realm of the profane. How then could we clarify our thoughts and concentrate our spirits, lest we be ensnared by attachments and chase after transient phenomena?

The One True Essence is lost, and myriad demons assail us. We humbly implore the Celestial Sovereign’s boundless compassion to proclaim the wondrous law that severs obstacles. Thus, we earnestly petition and, according to the scriptures, confess our transgressions. May we be cleansed of all defilements, that our inner essence may shine luminous and clear; may the veils of illusion be swept away, that our enlightened vision may radiate brilliance. May we wield the sword of wisdom to sever our faults, removing the obstacles of affliction while recording our virtues. May our mortal forms be purified, our Dao’s fruition complete. May blessings permeate both the seen and unseen realms, and wisdom illuminate the singular nature of enlightenment. As the darkness dissipates and the sun shines forth, as clouds scatter and the sky clears—may we forever attain boundless freedom, free from all cycles of rebirth.

With sincere hearts, we prostrate and gratefully acknowledge the Supreme Void Sovereign, the Three Pure Ones of Ultimate Truth.

**The Fifth Volume of the Jade Sovereign’s Fulfilled Wishes, the Precious Confession Scroll**
**The Sixth Volume of the Jade Sovereign’s Fulfilled Wishes, the Precious Confession Scroll**
**The Volume of Disaster Dissolution**

Humbly, we observe the fast and purify ourselves before the Emperor, hoping that our sincerity may subtly penetrate the divine. The fragrant incense stirs the spirits, ascending through the mist to reach the heavens. With reverence, we offer the scents of Dao, virtue, wisdom, non-action, purity, naturalness, the wondrous true cave, the transcendence of the Three Realms, and the true essence of the Three Spheres—filling the jade-paved capital of the heavens, encompassing the entire Dharma realm, and universally extending our offerings.

We invoke the scripture masters: the Primordial Heavenly Sovereign of Origin, the Jade Emperor of Nurturing and Delivering the Precious Essence, the Heavenly Sovereign of Manifesting Sacred Teachings and Descending to Birth, the Celestial Bodhisattvas of the Jade Sovereign, the Highest Heavenly Emperor of the Boundless Void, the Celestial Father of Radiant Splendor and Wondrous Joy, the Celestial Mother, the Precious Moonlight Empress, the Pure and Natural Awakened King as the High Void, Clear, and Illuminating Heavenly Sovereign.

In response to the divine assembly, all true immortals—
We rely on the true incense, universally offering reverence, hoping that the celestial compassion may descend and inspect our humble pleas.

Incense and flowers are arranged for homage, lamps and fruits are widely displayed for offerings. We humbly hope that the Emperor may temporarily depart the celestial court and grace our mortal gathering. May you observe our utmost sincerity, accepting our gratitude as fragrant offerings; may you heed our earnest prayers, fulfilling our humble devotion.

Facing the Primordial Mercy, we proclaim the confession law. We, the assembly of the Daoist gathering, each with focused minds, kneel in reverence and perform the confession as prescribed.

**Recorded by the ordained disciple [name], led by the official [name], sincerely and devoutly presenting to the Three Pure Ones of Supreme Holiness, the Jade Sovereign of Highest Majesty, the Celestial Father and Mother, the Most Sacred and True, the Three Treasures of the Three Realms, all true spirits.**

We, your humble disciples, have heard that in past lives, you were the royal heir, toiling to cultivate the profound Dao and rescue countless beings over the three thousand aeons. Through the sacred body, you nurtured the embryonic essence of life; though your Dharma body was the original source of the Way, you transformed and manifested without end. Unparalleled and supreme, you ride the highest vehicle, your profound principles reaching the utmost depths, your imperial virtues vast and mighty. Unbroken and undying, you vanish yet remain, your great compassion and great mercy, your great pity and great aspiration unmatched and beyond measure.

With deepest devotion, we take refuge, pay homage, chant your names, and visualize your forms, following your teachings and invoking blessings as the scriptures prescribe.

**All prostrate.**
**The Most High, the Supreme Miraculous Heavenly Sovereign.**

「矧为人类，不能离数而超缘。
Even more so, as beings of humanity, we cannot transcend the laws of fate nor escape the bonds of destiny.

天地亦有於否终，日月尚闻於薄蚀。
Even Heaven and Earth have their moments of decline, and the sun and moon are subject to eclipses.

三灾八难，九厄十缠，锺人而人不能安，移岁而岁不能稔。
The Three Calamities and Eight Hardships, the Nine Afflictions and Ten Entanglements—
they mark humanity, so that no person may find peace,
they shift with each year, yet no year may bring prosperity.

既遵典教，已罄忏禳。
Having followed the sacred teachings and exhausted our rites of repentance and expiation,

伏愿悉获消除，退严星而平舛运；
we humbly pray that all be dispelled,
that the stern fate stars be softened and the errant flow of destiny be smoothed.

咸蒙护度，回定数而解前缘。
May all be protected and guided,
returning our fixed destiny and severing past karmic ties.

洪灾散於万殊，厄会消於一已。
Let great calamities disperse among myriad beings,
and afflictions vanish for all who seek refuge here.

余殃以殄，劫运可逃，
May remaining disasters be extinguished,
and the karmic cycles of the kalpas be evaded—

至道岸无使灾侵，处尘寰动与吉会。
the Dao’s shore unassailable by calamity,
and in the dusty world, may we encounter auspicious gatherings.

并与同居诸眷，更为在世群生。
Together with our co-residing kin and for all living beings in this world,

and the **Awakened Sovereign of Purity and Naturalness**,
the **Tathagata** of the **High Void and Clear Heavenly Lord**.

慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，

the **True Sage of Seeking the Voice** who rescues from suffering—

济生度死真人，万福护身真人，
the **True Sage of Saving Life and Guiding Death**,
the **True Sage of Ten-Thousand Blessings** who protects the body—

妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，
the **True Sage of Wondrous Conduct**,
the **Moonlit Jade Maiden**,
the **Spiritual Consort Jade Maiden**,
and all **Primordial Lords**—

三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，
the **Great Vehicle Bodhisattvas** of the **Three Ages** and **Golden Immortals**,
and the **Ten-Directional Most Holy and Boundless Sovereigns**—

三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，
the **Three Primordial and Three Official Great Emperors**,
and the **Four Celestial Saints of the Northern Pole**—

南辰北斗、周天列曜、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，
the **Southern Star and Northern Dipper**,
the **Celestial Hosts of the Ten Directions**,
the **Clustered True Immortals of the Pole-Encompassing Realm**,
and the **Natural Great Immortal, True Sovereign of Heaven**—

三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，
the **Great Dao Master** who supports the teachings and aids the primordial in the **Three Heavens**—

九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，
the **Nine-Heaven Sovereign of Opening Transformation**,
who governs provisions and vast benevolence—

演教警化纯阳孚佑帝君，
the **Pure Yang Sovereign of Propagating the Teachings and Warning Transformation**,
who bestows auspicious aid—

洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，
the **White True Sage of the Jade Hare** who illuminates the **Dao of the Mysterious Cavern** and benefits the world—

清微启教紫虚保仙元君，
the **Primordial Lord of the Azure Void** who safeguards immortals and initiates the teachings—

灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，
the **moral teachers and immortal sages** of all sects—
the **Spiritual Treasure**, the **Dao of Morality**, the **Orthodox Unity**, and the **Complete Reality**—
who expound the law, leave written teachings,
transmit the Dao, impart the arts,
elucidate the scriptures, and guide beings—

雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，
the **celestial generals of thunderous command**,
and the **officials of sacred talismans and seals**—

十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，
the **Ten-Directional Flying Celestial Kings**,
the **Heavenly Laborers of Power**,
and the **martial hosts of all immortals**—

五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，
the **Five-Peak True Lords**,
the **Holy Multitudes of Earth and Water**,
and the **gods of city gods, pestilence, and calamity**—

功曹符使，里域灵官，
the **Functional Officials of Talismans**,
and the **Spiritual Officials of the Local Realms**—

三界万灵，十方真宰。
the **Ten-Thousand Spirits of the Three Realms**,
and the **True Rulers of the Ten Directions**.

法筵应感，一切真仙。
In response to the **auspicious scriptural assembly**, all true immortals.

悉仗真香，普同供养。
All rely on the **true incense**, universally sharing in the offerings.

恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。

臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷。
We humbly present this prayer,

香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。
incense and flowers arranged for **refuge-taking**,

俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢；
May He look down upon our **sincere devotion**,

洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微诚。
May He deeply pity our earnest prayers,

仰对元慈，宣扬忏法。
We face upward toward **Primordial Mercy**,

举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法
All gathered at the **Dao assembly**,

prostrate in long kneeling,

奏启三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，

the **Jade Emperor of Most High Veneration**,
Our **Celestial Father and Mother**—

至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。
the **Most Holy and Most True**,
the **Three Treasures of the Three Realms**,
and all **true spirits**.

We humbly hear:
Your **Supreme Abode in the True Void of the Northern Pole**—

是身，清净之道身；
Your **form is the body of the Dao of Purity**—

本行，难行之苦行。
Your **original conduct is the arduous practice of the hard-to-follow path**.

济幽拯显，宣正化而扬神功；
You **save the obscure and rescue the manifest**,
proclaiming **orthodox transformation** and displaying **divine power**.

助国救人，施财宝而舍血肉。
You **aid the realm and save beings**,
bestowing **treasures of wealth** and sacrificing **flesh and blood**.

启诸道藏，演说灵章，
You **open all Dao repositories**,
and expound the **divine scriptures**—

教菩萨之大乘，悟金仙之妙道。
teaching the **Great Vehicle** to Bodhisattvas,
and awakening the **wondrous Dao** of Golden Immortals.

为慈悲父，诚大丈夫，
As the **Father of Compassion and Mercy**,
the **true hero of sincerity**—

大圣大慈，大悲大愿，
the **Great Sage of Great Compassion**,
the **Great Sage of Great Mercy and Vows**—

昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。
unprecedented in the past,
whose virtues are beyond all praise.

臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，
Our **lowly hearts** are filled with **unbounded earnestness**,
praying for **uttermost praise and exaltation**—

普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，
for all **past ancestors**,
**present kin**,
**beings of the dusty world**,
and **lonely souls of the endless night**—

倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，
we **pour forth devotion**,

称扬名号，着想尊容，
proclaiming Your **glorious names**,

如教奉行，依经祝愿。
as taught, we follow Your precepts,
and, relying on the scriptures, we make our wishes.

众□ 太上弥罗无上天。」

ascending together to the **Realm of Benevolent Longevity**.

as if dwelling in **both the celestial and mortal worlds**.

**bow in homage** and **offer thanks** to the **Supreme Celestial Treasures**—
the **Seven Volumes of the Jade Emperor’s Perfect Repentance**.

the **Southern Star and Northern Dipper**,

the **Natural Immortals of the Supreme True Person**,

**take refuge and pay homage**,

**contemplate Your noble form**,

All **True Celestials**,
**Most High Supreme Lord of the Mystic Vault**.」

chunks.original_text: 臣等志心皈神、皈身皈命，玉皇大天尊，玄穹高上帝。 重念臣某弟子某等求道未勤，修真有怠，再观本行之经教，深贵能持之学人。 凡读是经，可得真人之睿号； 倘集其奥，获蒙仙道之圆成。 敢迭伸礼拜之恭，庶可沐简穰之降。 一心发念，众口宣扬，特祈断障以消愆，故究造玄而入妙。 爰伸禳谢，以丐提携。 伏愿道炁咸臻，超沉尸而起飞魄； 天福益固，游圣域而听法音。 神超八极以逍遥，身处五云而赫奕。 克成道果，不复凡身。 三界侍卫而司迎，千灵敬仰而慑伏。 上及过往祖祢，下同见在师资，俱入妙门，同登道岸。 某等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇正真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之八竟 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之九 结意 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 臣等恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清净香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教道德天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清净自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天列宿、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演教警化纯阳孚佑帝君，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，清微启教紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，功曹符使，里域灵官，三界万灵，十方众圣。 法筵应感，一切真仙。 悉仗真香，普同供养。 恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。 臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷。 以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱，香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。 恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微诚。 仰对元慈，宣扬忏法。 举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领录奉大道弟子某等谨虔诚再拜，奏启三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻：妙有真境，弥罗上天，道妙而玄之又玄，位尊而上极无上。 湛寂真静，信常拟议之至难； 恢漠神通，岂在形容之可尽。 巍巍大范，寂寂无宗，为玉皇高上尊，是金阙玄穹主。 拔度生死，运化古今，大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，着想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众□ 太上弥罗无上天。
