Our devoted hearts pay homage with **sincere reverence** to the **Dao/Way**, to the **Body**, and to **Life-Command**,
to the **Greatest Heavenly Sovereign**, the **Highest Celestial Emperor**.

**Deeply reflecting** upon our **humble disciples**—how we have **failed to diligently seek the Dao/Way**,
how our **cultivation of the True** has been **remiss**—
we **re-examine** the **precepts and teachings** of our own conduct,
and **revere** those **learned ones** who **can uphold** them.

**All who read** this **sutra** may **obtain** the **title of the True Person**;
**if they gather** its **essence**, they may **attain** the **perfection of the Immortal Dao/Way**.

We **dare to repeatedly** extend our **profoundest obeisance**,
hoping thus to **receive** the **Jade Sovereign’s gracious favor**.

With **single-minded devotion**, we **recite aloud**,
that **All True Celestials** may **severely cut through obstacles** and **dispel faults**,
and **delve deeply** into the **mysteries** to **enter the marvelous**.

Thus we **offer supplication and gratitude**,
and **beg** for **guidance and uplift**.

We **humbly pray** that **Dao/Way and qi** may **all arrive**,
that we may **transcend the sinking corpse** and **ascend with the flying soul**;
that **Heavenly blessings** may **become evermore firm**,
and we may **roam the sacred realm**, **listening to the dharma sounds**.

That our **spirits may transcend the Eight Poles** and **soar freely**,
and our **bodies dwell among the Five Clouds**, **radiant and resplendent**.

To **fully realize the Dao/Way’s fruits**,
and **no longer be bound to the mortal form**.

That we may **attend the Three Realms** as **guardians and welcome escorts**,
and **all ten thousand spirits** may **revere and submit** to us.

**Above**, to **include past and present ancestors**,
**below**, to **unify living teachers and disciples**,
all may **enter the wondrous gate**,
and **together ascend the Dao/Way’s shore**.

Our **humble disciples**, with **devoted hearts**, **bow in obeisance**,
and **offer gratitude** to the **Supreme Void Sovereign** and the **Three Treasures of True Reality**.

**The Supreme Jade Sovereign’s** *Volume of Satisfied Vows for the Treasure of Repentance* (the **eighth** and **ninth**)
—**the conclusion** of our vows.

We **humbly supplicate** the **Emperor** with **fasting and purity**,
hoping to **penetrate** with **sincere sincerity**;
that **fragrant incense** may **touch the spirits**,
and **rely on the rising qi** to **ascend and reach** Him.

Our **humble disciples** **reverently offer** the **Dao/Way’s incense**, the **virtue’s incense**, the **wisdom’s incense**, the **Non-Action’s incense**, the **Pure and Clear’s incense**, the **Natural’s incense**, the **Wondrous Cavern’s True Incense**, the **Transcending Three Realms’ Incense**, and the **Three Realms’ True Incense**,
**filling the Palace of the Jade Sovereign** with **splendor**,
**pervading the Heavenly Law’s realm**,
and **universally extending** our **devotion and offerings**.

The **Sutra’s Master**, the **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign**,
the **Emperor of the Jade Sovereign’s Dao/Way**, who **embraces and delivers**,
the **Heavenly Sovereign of Moral Dao/Way**, who **flows and propagates** the **Holy Teachings**,
and the **Greatest Heavenly Sovereign**, the **Embodiment of All Celestials**—
the **Highest Celestial Emperor**, **Jade Sovereign**.

The **King of Radiant Splendor and Wondrous Joy**,
**Father of the Emperor**,
the **Queen of Precious Moon and Radiant Light**,
**Mother of the Emperor**,
the **Awakened King of Pure and Natural Clarity**—
the **High Void Sovereign**, the **Pure and Clear Heavenly Sovereign Emperor**.

**The Heavenly Sovereign**, to whom **we humbly submit** our **petitions**,
**the Jade Void Sovereign**, the **Celestial Sovereign**,
the **Five Elders Sovereigns**,
the **True Persons of Compassionate Salvation from Calamity**,
the **True Persons of Rescuing by Voice and Relieving Suffering**,
the **True Persons of Saving Life and Delivering Death**,
the **True Persons of Ten Thousand Blessings and Body Protection**,
the **True Persons of Wondrous Conduct**,
the **Lady of Nightly Radiance**, the **Lady of Divine Consort**,
and **all Elemental Lords**,
the **Great Bodhisattvas of the Golden Vehicle** across the **Three Ages**,
the **Limitless Holy Sovereigns** from the **Ten Directions**,
the **Three Primordials and Three Officials**,
the **Four True Sovereigns of the Northern Pole**,
the **Southern Star and Northern Dipper**, the **Heavenly Hosts of the Celestial Cycle**, the **Group of Natural Celestial Spirits** who **support the Pole**,
the **True Sovereigns of the Three Heavens**, who **propagate the Teachings** and **assist the Primordials**,
the **Sovereign Emperors of the Nine Heavens**, who **open enlightenment** and **administer blessings**,
the **Pure and Auspicious Sovereign Emperors of Propagating Teachings and Warning Enlightenments**,
the **True Persons of the Wondrous Cavern**, who **benefit the World**,
the **Elemental Lords of Pure Clarity and Teaching Propagation**,
the **Elemental Lords of Mysterious Treasures**,
the **Elemental Lords of Dao/Way and Virtue**,
the **Elemental Lords of Rectification and Perfection**,
and **all moral teachers** of the **Schools of Mysterious Treasures, Dao/Way, Rectification, and Perfection**,
who **propagate the Teachings**, **transmit the Scriptures**, **deliver the Dao/Way**, **instruct in the arts**, and **explicate the Teachings** to **save beings**,
the **Thunderous Officials and Celestial Generals**, the **Officials of Ordination and Seals of Authority**,
the **Flying Celestial Kings** of the **Ten Directions**,
the **Celestial Laborers** and **Divine Warriors**,
the **True Sovereigns of the Five Sacred Peaks**,
the **Holy Spirits of Earth and Water**,
the **City Deities and Plague-Fire Gods**,
the **Functional Deities of Records and Summons**,
the **Spirits of the Neighborhoods**,
the **Ten Thousand Spirits of the Three Realms**,
and **all Holy Ones of the Ten Directions**.

**All True Celestials**,
**the Supreme Original Void Sovereign**—
**respond to the offerings** of the **Law’s assembly**.

**All rely** upon the **True Incense**,
and **universally share** in the **devotion and offerings**.

**We reverently await** the **Heavenly Compassion**,
and **humbly pray** for **favor and discernment**.

Our **humble disciples** **solemnly present** their **sincere wishes**,
and **follow** their **supplications**.

On this **reverent day** of the **Mid-Autumn Festival**,
we **display** our **loyal and humble sincerity**,
with **incense and flowers arranged** for **surrender and devotion**,
and **lamps and fruits set forth** for **offerings and reverence**.

**We humbly pray** that the **Emperor** may **temporarily depart** from His **palace**,
and **graciously descend** to our **mortal assembly**.

**He may observe** our **sincere and earnest** hearts,
and **see** the **reports of gratitude** from **lowly beings**;
**He may penetrate** our **humble and earnest** prayers,
and **respond** to the **sincerity of our devotion**.

**We face upward** to the **Primordial Compassion**,
and **proclaim** the **method of repentance**.

**All**, with **the assembly of the Dao/Way**,
each **with their hearts**—
**long kneeling**, **repenting as prescribed**,
the **officiating disciples** **leading the recording**,
our **humble disciples** **bow twice in utmost sincerity**,
and **present their petitions** to the **Three Pure Ones of Supreme Holiness**,
the **Jade Sovereign of Highest Veneration**,
the **Heavenly Father and Mother**,
the **Supreme Holy and Supreme True**,
the **Three Treasures and Three Realms**,
and **all True Spirits**.

Our **humble disciples** **reverently hear**:
The **Wondrous True Realm**,
the **Supreme Original Void Heaven**,
the **Dao/Way’s marvels**—
**profound, mysterious, and yet more mysterious**,
the **position’s eminence**—
**supreme, highest, and beyond the highest**.

The **deep stillness and true tranquility**,
how **truly difficult** it is to **conceive and discuss**;
the **vastness and divine penetration**,
how **can it be fully described** by **form and appearance**?

The **immense and solemn** **scope**,
**silent and without dogma**,
is the **Highest Celestial Emperor**—
the **Master of the Golden Palace and Mysterious Vault**.

**He liberates beings** from **birth and death**,
**transforms and governs** the **ancient and the present**,
with **great holiness and great compassion**,
**great pity and great vows**—
**never before seen**, **praise cannot exhaust**.

Our **humble disciples’** **lowly sentiments** are **without limit** in **devotion and praise**,
and we **universally extend** to **past ancestors, present kin, all beings in the dusty world, and souls in eternal darkness**,
our **pouring out of reverence and devotion**,
our **surrender and respectful homage**,
our **chanting of His name**,
our **contemplation of His glory**,
our **following of His teachings**,
and our **supplications according to the sutra**.

chunks.original_text: 得睹慈颜，罪福之缘而明了； 普闻妙法，障固之目而断除。 消灾集福以成真，赞叹皈依而满愿。 实为庆幸，岂匪因缘。 庶蒙真境之自明，得俾诸尘之无起。 悉令意遂，莫使心违。 伏愿江海山林，尽赖帝名之余福； 人天风雨，皆沾经力之大恩。 庶民乐业以无虞，国土清平而有庆，称心如意，与道合真。 财宝充盈而自然，子孙荣贵而丰盛。 七祖九玄超度，六亲百眷和昌。 永庇含生，普希大宥。 臣等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇至真三宝。 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之九竟 高上玉皇满愿宝忏卷之十 满愿 伏以斋戒事帝，冀肸蠁以潜通； 馨香感神，仗氤氲而上达。 臣等恭运道香、德香、慧香、无为香、清静香、自然香、妙洞真香、超三界香、三境真香，满琼楼玉京，遍周天法界，普伸供养。 说经教主元始天尊、抱送玉帝道君天尊、流演圣教道德天尊、诸天化身玉皇大天尊玄穹高上帝，帝父光严妙乐国王，帝母宝月光皇后，清净自然觉王如来高虚清明天主帝君。 经筵启问玉虚上帝，昊天上帝，五老上帝，慈悲度厄真人，寻声救苦真人，济生度死真人，万福护身真人，妙行真人，夜光玉女、灵妃玉女、一切元君，三世金仙大乘菩萨，十方至圣无量帝君，三元三官大帝，北极四圣真君，南辰北斗、周天列曜、拱极群真自然大仙天真皇人，三天扶教辅元大法天师真君，九天开化司禄宏仁帝君，演教警化纯阳孚佑帝君，洞玄惠世玉蟾白真人，清微启教紫虚保仙元君，灵宝、道德、正一、全真诸派演法垂文传道授业阐教度人一切道德师尊仙众，雷霆诸司天将、法箓印令官君，十方飞天神王、天丁力士、诸仙兵马，五岳真君，地水圣众、城隍瘟火等神，功曹符使，里域灵官，三界万灵，十方众圣。 法筵应感，一切真仙。 悉仗真香，普同供养。 恭望天慈，俯垂降鉴。 臣谨奏为入意愿冀感通，曲从所祷，以今恭逢谷旦，式展刍忱，香花罗列以皈依，灯果广陈而供养。 恭望暂离帝阙，款驻凡筵。 俯察精虔，鉴苹蘩之报谢； 洞矜恳祷，副草芥之微诚。 仰对元慈，宣扬忏法举 道场众等人各运心　长跪礼忏如法 具箓职臣某领词奉大道弟子某等谨虔诚再拜，上奏三清上圣，玉皇至尊，帝父帝母，至圣至真，三宝三界，一切真灵。 臣等恭闻：巍巍金阙，渺渺重霄，弘为诸佛之圣师，证作万天之帝主。 慈悲一切，故放十七大光明； 愍念有情，特示三十种功德。 是穹苍主为浩劫，尊每利济於群生，常行化於多劫。 普垂教法，周徧名声，大圣大慈，大悲大愿，昔未曾有，叹莫能穷。 臣等下情无任恳祝赞扬之至，普与过往祖先、见存眷属、尘寰品汇、长夜幽魂，倾倒虔恭，皈依敬礼，称扬名号，注想尊容，如教奉行，依经祝愿。 众□ 太上弥罗无上天。

chunks.original_text: 岂有其心之可一，惟无所愿之不同。 各有所求，或务济民而利物； 岂无要者，欲求证道以成真。 坠苦常欲於升迁，贫穷惟思於富贵，必待其满而后释。 然仰惟妙道之垂慈，能遂众生之所欲。 用敢饭命，求乞从人。 伏愿俯察凡忱，尚赖随机而赴感。 特垂天听，悉令应念以从心。 先祈保国以保民； 次冀利他而利己。 为幽为显，亘古亘今，见存眷属以咸宁，过往祖先而普度。 福利九幽破坏，功沾长夜光明。 并与群生，同依众善。 臣等志心稽首，礼谢无上虚皇正真三宝。 回向 人情有恪，作善降之百祥； 帝念无私，惟天佑于一德。 向来臣法众等，恭对大道，御前拜礼，《太上洞玄灵宝高上玉皇满愿宝忏》一部，计终十卷。 以兹功德，专为奉道弟子某悔过消灾延生集庆。 伏愿凡情通感，上帝鉴观。 障断罪除，心愿悉臻於满足，灾消福集，玄功获遂於圆成。 与诸有情，证无上道，皈依三宝，回向九清，为上因缘，志心称念：大圣元始天尊，上清灵宝天尊，太上道德天尊，玉皇宥过天尊。 无量不可思议功德。 高上玉皇满显宝忏卷之十竟
chunks.translated_text:
How could there be but one heart when all desires differ?
Each holds their own longings—some seek to save the people and benefit all beings,
Yet what is truly essential is to seek the Dao and attain the True.

Those bound in suffering only wish for advancement,
The poor and destitute long for wealth and honor,
Ever waiting until their desires are fulfilled before release.

Yet, contemplating the wondrous Dao’s boundless compassion,
It grants all sentient beings their deepest wishes.

Thus, we dare to surrender our lives,
Seeking to follow the will of others.

Humbly, we pray for Your gracious inspection of our sincere devotion,
Still relying on the Dao’s adaptability to respond to our needs.

First, we pray for the protection of the nation and its people;
Next, we hope to benefit others while benefiting ourselves.

Whether in the unseen or the seen,
From ancient times to the present,
May all living descendants be cherished in peace,
And all ancestors past be universally liberated.

May blessings reach the Nine Hells and dispel their suffering,
And merit shine through the endless night.

Together with all beings, may we depend on the multitude of virtues.

With sincere devotion, we prostrate and give thanks to the **Supreme Void Sovereign of the Three Jewels**.

**Dedication:**
As human nature is dutiful, may those who do good receive a hundred blessings;
As the Emperor’s mercy is boundless, may Heaven’s aid rest upon **virtue alone**.

Previously, we, the disciples of the Dao, reverently addressed the Great Way,
Bowing in homage before You, presenting the *Supreme Scripture of the Mystic Vault’s Highest Treasure: The Celestial Sovereign’s Fulfilled Wish and Expiation*, in its entirety—ten volumes complete.

May this merit be dedicated solely for disciple [name]’s repentance, dispelling calamity, prolonging life, and gathering joyous fortune.

Humbly, we pray that human sentiment may resonate with the Divine,
And that the Celestial Sovereign may observe and grant our wishes.

May obstacles be removed, sins atoned,
And all desires fulfilled to their utmost.
May disasters be averted and blessings gathered,
And the Mystic Virtue attain perfect fruition.

Together with all sentient beings,
May we attain the **Supreme Dao**,
Take refuge in the Three Jewels,
And dedicate ourselves to the Nine Purity Realms,
As the supreme cause and condition,
With sincere devotion, we invoke:

**The Most Holy Primordial Celestial Sovereign,**
**The Sovereign of the Highest Clarity’s Treasure,**
**The Sovereign of the Supreme Dao’s Virtue,**
**The Celestial Sovereign Who Forgives Transgressions.**

**Unfathomable, boundless merit.**

*The Tenth Volume of the Highest Treasure: The Celestial Sovereign’s Fulfilled Display and Expiation* is now complete.
